title: Paree Relax Ribbed Quarantine Flare Pants
description: Our Quarantine Collection was birthed during the 2020 lock-down. Many of you loved this collection then and continued to love it way long after MCO was lifted. We made it to be comfortable, soft, cooling and flowy for home wear as we were stuck at home, yet presentable and pretty enough to be worn in front of family members and housemates all day.
